text:
James Kimberley Corden, OBE (born 22 August 1978) is an English actor, writer, producer, comedian, and television host. He currently hosts the late-night television talk show "The Late Late Show with James Corden" on CBS.
In 2018, Corden voiced Peter Rabbit in the 2018 animated movie "Peter Rabbit".

annotations.surface_form: The Late Late Show with James Corden
